resources.string: Search for an Artist or Band
Please enter an artist or band name

With this activity, you can search for your favourite artists or bands, build a library of favourites, and check out some tabs to learn how to play them. Type an artist in the search bar for a list of songs available. Then, click on any song in the list to add it to your favourites or to view the tabs. You can also see a full list of the artist\'s tabs available. From the main screen, select the \'Favourites\' button to view your library of songs.
This app uses auto-trader\'s publicly accessible API to streamline private and dealership automotive sales by make and model.
Hit the button let\'s go to search for a vehicle
Enter a make in the search bar, press the search models button, click a model for more options, OR Click \'Favorited\' at the bottom to view saved searches
Click a car for more options. Long-click a car in the list to remove from \'Favorited\' OR Click Search at the bottom to perform a search.

Hit the top left icon for more options. Add the selected vehicle to \'Favorites\' Launch a browser that queries AutoTrader for this vehicle. Launch a google search for this vehicle OR Click Search at the bottom to perform another model search. Click \'Favorited\' to visit your Favorites.

This is a simple trivia game app. Choose the difficulty, type and number of questions from the below menu. During the quiz, you only have one chance to answer each question, and you cannot re-answer a question. After all the questions are answered, you will be directed to the score screen. Bonne chance!
Are you sure you wanna close the app?
All the questions should be answered first!
Welcome to the CST2235 Final Project App
Select one of the following APIs, each providing a unique service:
The Auto API allows you to search for any make and model of vehicle, find information about it, and even see where it is available to buy through AutoTrader.ca.
The Songsterr API allows you to search for your favourite songs and artists on Songsterr, and build your very own library of favourites.
The SportingNews (soccer) API allows you to search for the most pressing news in the world of soccer and to save your favourite articles.
The Trivia API allows you to build your own custom set of trivia questions and save your favourites.
